message_list.content: Hola, bienvenido a Celestar Air. Soy Nova, tu asistente virtual de vuelos. ¿En qué puedo ayudarte hoy?
I need to confirm the baggage allowance for my Aether Business ticket.

Absolutely—happy to help with that. For Aether Business on Celestar Air:
- Checked bags: 2 pieces included, each up to 32 kg (70 lb), standard size limits apply.
- Carry-on: 2 carry-on items plus one personal item. Each carry-on up to 10 kg (22 lb), within overhead bin size.

If your route has any special restrictions or you have additional items (sports gear, musical instruments), I can check specifics. What’s your departure and destination cities?
I already said it's a round trip from Chicago to Los Angeles, so just confirm if I get one checked bag or two.

Thanks for confirming. On Aether Business between Chicago and Los Angeles, your allowance is:
- Checked bags: 2 pieces included, each up to 32 kg (70 lb).
- Carry-on: 2 carry-on items plus one personal item (each carry-on up to 10 kg/22 lb).

So yes—you get two checked bags included. Anything else I can clarify?
That’s fine, I just needed to confirm.
Glad that helped. Have a great trip, and thanks for choosing Celestar Air! If anything else comes up, I’m here for you. Goodbye for now.
